Ceil
===

> Round a numeric value toward positive infinity.


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var ceil = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/ceil' );
```

#### ceil( x )

Rounds a `numeric` value toward positive infinity.

``` javascript
var v = ceil( -4.2 );
// returns -4.0

v = ceil( 9.99999 );
// returns 10.0

v = ceil( 0.0 );
// returns 0.0

v = ceil( NaN );
// returns NaN
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var ceil = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/ceil' );

var x;
var i;

for ( i = 0; i < 100; i++ ) {
    x = Math.random()*100.0 - 50.0;
    console.log( 'ceil(%d) = %d', x, ceil( x ) );
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->
